Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: When men reach their sixties and retire, they go to pieces. Women go right on cooking

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: The perceptions of middle age have their own luminosity

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth demands a temporary surrender of security

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: The delights of self-discovery are always available

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a paradox that as we reach out prime, we also see there is a place where it finishes

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex and older women used to be considered an oxymoron, rarely mentioned in the same breath

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: The first thing one notices about Jill Abramson is her short stature. The second is her intensity

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of sarcastic. Not cynical but sarcastic

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a genuine person - I will never promote something I don't believe in

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I represent the 'Wonder Woman' of the new world

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I just keep active - everything that's challenging me, everything that I feel like doing

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: If things had gone according to my plans, I'd be a lawyer. I never dreamt of being an actress

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been very active all my life. I was a combat instructor in the Israeli Army

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is so important for girls and boys to have a female, strong superhero to look up to

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, I was a dancer. I wanted to be a choreographer

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I do cardio, but I don't like it as much. I'd rather do weights

Quote.Author: Gal Gadot
Quote.QuoteValue: I danced for 12 years, and I played a lot team sports: basketball, volleyball

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot teach people anything; we can only help them discover it within themselves

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: The Milky Way is nothing else but a mass of innumerable stars planted together in clusters

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: And yet it moves

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: Where the senses fail us, reason must step in

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: We must say that there are as many squares as there are numbers

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: By denying scientific principles, one may maintain any paradox

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: The Bible shows the way to go to heaven, not the way the heavens go

Quote.Author: Galileo Galilei
Quote.QuoteValue: Measure what is measurable, and make measurable what is not so

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to look reality in the eye, and deny it

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in looking reality straight in the eye and denying it

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: A book is a gift you can open again and again

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the most un-American thing you can say is, 'You can't say that.'

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: The funniest line in English is 'Get it?' When you say that, everyone chortles

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a shallow life that doesn't give a person a few scars

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: The highlight of my childhood was making my brother laugh so hard that food came out of his nose

Quote.Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote.QuoteValue: Lake Wobegon, the little town that time forgot and the decades cannot improve

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: Women, by their nature, are not exceptional chess players: they are not great fighters

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: Chess is mental torture

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: I think our chances are not looking great today but the only way to fail for me is just not to try

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: Russian Parliament today is a bunch of puppets that just fall in with the instructions from Kremlin

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: We've been saying Putin is a dictator for years who doesn't care about the law

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, it's all about money

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: I have great energy and I have great tasks ahead of me

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: I've met enough KGB colonels in my life

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Russians today have a distorted picture of capitalism, liberal democracy and market economy

Quote.Author: Garry Kasparov
Quote.QuoteValue: It's quite difficult for me to imagine my life without chess

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: Nice guys finish first. If you don't know that, then you don't know where the finish line is

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: Without comedy as a defense mechanism I wouldn't be able to survive

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm dating a woman now who, evidently, is unaware of it

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: I once made love for an hour and fifteen minutes, but it was the night the clocks are set ahead

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: My friends tell me I have an intimacy problem. But they don't really know me

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm too shy to express my sexual needs except over the phone to people I don't know

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: I am pretty tenacious as a perfectionist in terms of getting something right

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone at a party is uncomfortable. Knowing that makes me more comfortable

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a good chance that if you're talking to me when I'm snoring, it means I'm bored

Quote.Author: Garry Shandling
Quote.QuoteValue: Carol Burnett was particularly funny. She swore for the first time on television on Larry Sanders

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Just keep taking chances and having fun

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend all my time right now trying to combat music retail and copyright

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Any time I'm in a moving thing, like an airplane, I'm usually asleep before we even get on our way

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: True country music is honesty, sincerity, and real life to the hilt

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: People aren't always themselves. They're always holding back something

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: You know me, I've got to find some way to get a fresh fire

Quote.Author: Garth Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand straight, walk proud, have a little faith

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not jealous, and I'm not possessive, and I'm not controlling

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: If you take shortcuts, you get cut short

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself a Texan. I grew up in Texas and Oklahoma

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: Winners do what losers don't want to do

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: Amen is not the end of a prayer, it just gets us ready to go to the next level

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: Have a mind that's open to everything, get attached to nothing

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been told by doctors and surgeons that I have the energy of ten men who have normal jobs

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in all things that Donald Trump does. I've known him since 1980. He's a good man

Quote.Author: Gary Busey
Quote.QuoteValue: There has got to be more to life than being a really, really, ridiculously good actor

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for jamming and getting to know each other on the road

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: When 5150 came out rock was king. Post Nirvana and Pearl Jam 1996 is a different story

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: The voices on the record, that was trying to treat my voice like guitar players treat guitar tones

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: If people get to the end of the record, then that is a treat

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: I was growing up listening to Queen. Freddie Mercury threw those incredible melodies into his songs

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: Michael Anthony is the Diplomat of Rock N Roll. He is the regular guy

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: It was fun while it lasted, but it never seemed real to me. I could not believe I was in Van Halen

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: They hated Sammy Hagar for 12 years and they hate him to this day

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing like singing a song that 20,000 people know and are singing back to you

Quote.Author: Gary Cherone
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a big Pink Floyd fan. That is where a lot of the concept lyrics come from

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Regardless of who wins, an election should be a time for optimism and fresh approaches

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time you pass a law, it is a little bite out of freedom

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of being out there, campaigning, talking to people, is being able to read body language

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: If there were no government-guaranteed student loans, college tuition would be much lower

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm ready for a different America

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe there should be any restrictions when it comes to firearms. None

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just see religious freedom, as a category, as just being a black hole

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagine a libertarian president challenging Congress to repeal the PATRIOT Act

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagine a libertarian president challenging Congress for meaningful immigration reform

Quote.Author: Gary Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I reject the insurance model. I think we should have a free-market approach to healthcare

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: You choose your friends by their character and your socks by their color

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: My passion and energy get mistaken for anger

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: What other people think of me is none of my business

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Political correctness has become a straightjacket

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Overall I enjoy a certain anonymity. I live a very normal, very ordinary life

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a cheese and pickle. Nice cheese and pickle on a real old-fashioned bread. Ploughman's lunch

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality TV to me is the museum of social decay

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: But you see, I have played more good guys than I have played villains

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I got obsessed with classical music, I got obsessed with Chopin, with playing the piano

Quote.Author: Gary Oldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't ever a huge fan of comics. Just not one of those kids, you know?

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I have veterans in my family. But I didn't know anything about DAV, Disabled American Veterans

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always been my dream to do a dance scene with Anthony Hopkins

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always fascinated with rock 'n' roll, or girls, or something like that when I was a kid

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: But I've got more to learn, too. I don't feel like I'm done or I know it all

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I've been to Iraq twice now. I was in Baghdad in June and then north of Baghdad in November

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I save money when I'm working so that I never have to take a role simply to pay the bills

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you're in great demand. Then suddenly your career hits the breaks

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not like one of those actors who's a frustrated director

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I volunteered to support the troops, and get out there and show them that we care about them

Quote.Author: Gary Sinise
Quote.QuoteValue: I started a theater called Steppenwolf. We've been very supportive of the veterans there

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to let go of your fear and anxiety of being judged by others

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: As Mayor, I will use my experience to make San Francisco a place where small businesses can thrive

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm much more optimistic about this next generation because this is the first global generation

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: These Millennials are volunteering more; they're smarter than ever

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very successful father-in-law and family with very different political views

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to change incentives for good behavior as opposed to just disincentivizing bad behavior

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to let the rest of this country drift into the abyss. I want to fight for it

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: Street and park trees provide tremendous benefits to cities

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a good idea, the money flows

Quote.Author: Gavin Newsom
Quote.QuoteValue: The tech genie is out of the bottle; you can't put it back in

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to admit, if Oprah were a man, I would marry her

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the oldest of three girls. My sisters say I can be bossy

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm basically a really happy person. My life is nuts, but it feels complete

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll do almost anything for cake - even trample little children!

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all spending way too much of our time and energy trying to fight the stuff we can't change

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in an all-white community

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I only tweet if I discover something that's fantastic, or if I heard something really great

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I changed my name from Gail to Gayle in seventh grade because I liked to make a loopy 'y.'

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: I majored in psychology, and I still love listening to people's problems

Quote.Author: Gayle King
Quote.QuoteValue: People think that I don't work, and I fly around in Oprah's private plane doing whatever I want

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Women who choose to breastfeed should get as much education and support as possible

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that sometimes people are frightened to take the risk of entrepreneurship

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I worked at ABCNews.com at a time when nobody knew what 'dot com' was

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: The women of Afghanistan have a voice, and it needs to be heard and not forgotten

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: No one argues with the many benefits of breastfeeding for those women who choose it

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving birth to a baby does not make you an infant

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Single mothers are raising more of America's children than ever before

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot has been said about single mothers. Most of it has been less than flattering

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States will not be in Afghanistan forever

Quote.Author: Gayle Tzemach Lemmon
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not invest in victims, we invest in survivors

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess, we were people who just dedicated to trying to get better

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to practice on the bass, but I don't do it as often as I should

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard for me to just practice without writing something

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is all about wanting to be better at it

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: So, I really don't consider myself a fabulous keyboard player

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer of daylight in the studio

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always felt I was more accurately a Hard Rock musician

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, how I feel about what I wrote down turns into a song

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I am moved more by melodies, song structure, and evocative textures

Quote.Author: Geddy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel a little uncomfortable about endorsements

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Archery is something that I took up later and didn't know I had a natural aptitude for

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't ever gone to any Mensa meetings

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Archers are pretty focused

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: If you risk nothing, then you risk everything

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody warned me early on to be very careful about brushing up against the chocolate

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always looked up to him, even though he is shorter

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Rosie knows how to play ball. She's an athlete, for sure

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Something's like crossed over in me and I can't go back. I couldn't live

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman as the leader of the Free World is an impossibility. Muslim countries won't talk to you

Quote.Author: Geena Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really important for boys to see that girls take up half of the planet - which we do

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: What is success? It is a toy balloon among children armed with pins

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Never thank anybody for anything, except a drink of water in the desert - and then make it brief

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and memory last and will so endure till the game is called because of darkness

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: He has a profound respect for old age. Especially when it's bottled

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think my writing sounds like I walked out of the room and left the typewriter running

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to believe than to doubt

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Psychoanalysts seem to be long on information and short on application

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever one believes to be true either is true or becomes true in one's mind

Quote.Author: Gene Fowler
Quote.QuoteValue: If they haven't heard it before it's original

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not worried, you're not reasonable

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: The Vietnam War soured President Johnson's legacy. We still have to recognize his domestic legacy

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: People just don't know what civilian prisoners of war are

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, refiners, like all of us, are going to have to clean up their emissions

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: The knee-jerk approach of those who want to control firearms may not be the solution

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: You work really hard on something, and if you're lucky, you get a break

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: The Federal Communications Commission licensed satellite radio to be a national-only radio service

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: Sen. Clinton carried our district, and it is difficult to vote against your constituents

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no secret I was part of John Dingell's whip team

Quote.Author: Gene Green
Quote.QuoteValue: We should not continue to play politics with women's health

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Shadow Hero' was a dream to work on

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a cartoonist. I write and draw comic books and graphic novels. I'm also a coder

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hearing people who are smarter than me talk about my comics. It makes me feel smarter

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing, for me, is very inspiration-dependent. And inspiration can be a jerk

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: Carl Barks and Don Rosa are two of my favorite cartoonists ever

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: I work at a high school, and we have an anime and manga club

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Shadow Hero' was my first superhero story. I don't know why it took so long

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: In academia in general, there's this push toward using comics as an educational tool

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: Eventually, I just couldn't imagine myself being in a cubicle for my entire career

Quote.Author: Gene Luen Yang
Quote.QuoteValue: The most labor-intensive part of putting together a comic is the drawing

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Live and think like a poor man and you'll always be OK

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: You know why I'm pulling your leg? Because I can't touch it from where I am

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to approach every day like it's the only day I will ever have

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is feeling. You can try to verbalize it. It really just hits you or it doesn't

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Kiss is a Fourth of July fireworks show with a backbeat

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never interested in being a rock star. I always wanted to be Boris Karloff

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to have anything but delusional notions about yourself

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is an institution, and you must be fully committed to it

Quote.Author: Gene Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: The root of all evil isn't money; rather, it's not having enough money

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a little like a message in a bottle, to be carried by the winds and the tides

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is, I think, the worst of all faults because it makes a victim of both parties

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I was going to live on my salary or go down swinging

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I had been offered a Hollywood contract before my 18th birthday. It gave me the spark I needed

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: Some women feel the best cure for a broken heart is a new beau

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not cut out to be a rebel

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I admire anyone who rids himself of an addiction

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: Trying to make order out of my life was like trying to pick up a jellyfish

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure I can explain the nature of Jack Kennedy's charm, but he took life just as it came

Quote.Author: Gene Tierney
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I could not cope with the future unless I was able to rediscover the past

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I write funny. If I can make my wife laugh, I know I'm on the right track

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a unique form: a Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a very good life and a very good career. I have no regrets

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: What good is a character who's always winking at the audience to let them in on the secret?

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like giving speeches. It makes me nervous

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an actor, not a clown

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Pride is not the worst of sins. In fact, it's one of the most interesting ones

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I never used to believe in fate. I used to think you make your own life, and then you call it fate

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I've become pretty philosophical about a lot of things, including death. It doesn't get to me

Quote.Author: Gene Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: I've read everything printed in English that Freud has written. It helped me a great deal

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be nice to turn off that incessant churning of consciousness

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I can recognize when a piece is at a state of completion

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally, I'm not anti the novel

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: In terms of behaving in a civic way, I feel my behavior is always exemplary

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love festivals, period

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: It really doesn't matter if it happened exactly how I say it happened

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: People never read my books for the quality of the documentary value

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: If you just take me as a fiction writer, then you're probably going to find me fairly limited

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like to win at sport

Quote.Author: Geoff Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that form determines how readers read a book and how they judge it

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: All of nationalism can be understood as a kind of collective narcissism

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Lots of creativity is and should be solitary

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: The market turns out to be just one special case of collective decision-making

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Vigorous independent and critical media are indispensable in a democracy

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Huge sums are invested globally in medical research and development - and with good reason

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Adelaide is becoming a hub for higher education

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Spreading an idea is hard work

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't want charities to usurp the state as the core provider of social services

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: A tablet replacing an exercise book is not innovation, it's just a different way to make notes

Quote.Author: Geoff Mulgan
Quote.QuoteValue: All real capitalisms are impure hybrids, mongrels mixed with other strains

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the only billion dollar industry that tolerates abject failure

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Teachers need to be paid like professionals
